author: Guillaume SABOURAUD
comment: Much better than the official version

author: Joe M
comment: I've used this app since I had my note 2 and then when I purchased my note 3 I used it again and Note 4 and now I'm using my Note 5. And now the developer has updated the app to include the setup page on the main screen. He worked so well with me getting that accomplished and I'm so happy that now we can have the set up on the upper right hand corner of the screen. Fantastic app.  Love it everyone should get this one
title: Fantastic!!!

author: Paul Ryan
comment: Great convenient APP. Had slight issue with one feature and developer worked tirelessly and promptly to address issue and updated APP to suit. Would thoroughly recommend.
title: Fantastic

author: phil cunliffe
comment: Fantastic app for accessing your remote power. Really easy to configure. Had an initial problem with connection to remote power unit but the developer has been outstanding in replying and fixing the issue..easily gets 5 stars Just configured a couple of macros with the aid of the excellent manual....love the way you can put shortcuts to macros on your home page!!!
title: Excellent App

author: Angelo Bartolo
comment: This app is great works very good...
title: Awesome

comment: Flawless app, easy setup, faster than web IU. 10 stars app
title: AWESOME

author: P Latchman
comment: Once you use one of the supported switches, you need this app.  Don't even think twice, get it, you won't regret it!
title: Get it!

author: G Herrick
title: An excelllent app with a five star user manual

author: Charles Bailey
comment: At first, I thought this would just be a shortcut to the device's web page, but its not. Impressed.
title: Works well

author: Alexandre Racine
comment: Work perfectly. Use for m'y front house ligh, as if i toggle on/off manually, Nice réactive apps
title: Nothing to say

reply.author: Amapps
reply.content: Hi.  Please contact me on amapps2012@gmail.com and I'll get it working for you.  There's also a manual here: http://bit.ly/1a9oM5G and you can also try the free Lite version before buying anyway.
